price: Kõ sun riƙi waɗansu abũbuwan bautãwa baicinSa? Ka ce: "Ku kãwo hujjarku, wannan shi ne ambaton wanda yake tãre da ni, kuma shi ne ambaton wanda yake a gabãnĩna. Ã'a, mafi yawansubã su sanin gaskiya, sabõda haka sũ mãsu bijirẽwa ne."
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةٗۖ قُلۡ هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡۖ هَٰذَا ذِكۡرُ مَن مَّعِيَ وَذِكۡرُ مَن قَبۡلِيۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّۖ فَهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūnihi ālihatan qul hātū bur'hānakum hādhā dhik'ru man maʿiya wadhik'ru man qablī bal aktharuhum lā yaʿlamūna al-ḥaqa fahum muʿ'riḍūna
